name: Wine & Spirits
description:
Congratulations on the grand opening old friend!

After years of cryptic rituals, extensive incantations, and disastrous exorcisms, it's nice to see that pub you dreamed about for so long is up and running! Well, almost up and running. It seems some of your old haunts have followed you to your new establishment. You're going to need to clean them out before your doors open, but that shouldn't be too much a problem for a sorcerer like you...right?

Inspired by the game Golly! Ghost! Shoot and blast the intruding specters out your pub. Misery loves company, so bring a friend to help in the eviction process!

Made for the InspireJam & designed to be played on Society of Play's Arcade Cab, BUT you can play it on your machine.

  • WASD + Space recommended to recreate the joystick experience
  • Mouse if you want to cheat. :)
  • Controllers LS+A for multiple players

We used Clayxels and Shapes.

Made by Camille M, Kris O., Kalish, and Tyler T.
